properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 9 at 6:06AM EST until February 13 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a
Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky...

The Kentucky River near Ravenna

The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Kentucky River near Ravenna.
* until Thursday morning.
* at 5:15 AM Sunday the stage was 20.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 21.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue to steadily fall throughout the day.
* At 21.0 feet...Low lying areas flood. Red Lick Road, Millers Creek
Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road flood in several
places.
properties.instruction:
Continue to monitor NOAA weather radio or your favorite local media
outlet for additional information. If you are in areas affected by
this forecast take necessary precautions.

The next update will be issued by 4 PM today.
